channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report X-2023070150
item.description:
Report X-2023070150

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: LINCOLN
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler found package wet when they went to load it on the delivery van. He notified a manager about the leaking hazmat, who notified the rest of the staff on the radio. An admin went and grabbed the package and placed it in a red hazmat tote and took it to the QA cage for inspection. DescribePack: The package was inspected and it was found that one of the 4 inner packages of sodium hydroxide solution was leaking from around the cap. Can't gauge the size of the leak, but it is pretty slow. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a red hazmat tote to contain the leak
